subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Bill France Sr., Nascar’s founder, and his son Bill Jr., who ran it for nearly 30 years, were among the first five inductees of the Nascar Hall of Fame.
snippet: Bill France Sr., Nascar’s founder, and his son Bill Jr., who ran it for nearly 30 years, were among the first five inductees of the Nascar Hall of Fame.
